    Past classes PIC 10C S20 PIC 10C W20 PIC 10C F19

PIC 10C: Advanced Programming - Fall 2020

Professor: Michael Lindstrom
  • Office: Math Sciences 5622
Teaching Assistant: Me
Schedule:
  • Class: MWF 11-11:50am
  • Discussion: TR 11-11:50am (Pacific)
My Office Hours
  • Location: Zoom
  • Wednesday 2-3pm
  • Friday 12-1pm

The third part in the PIC 10 series of classes, PIC 10C covers more advanced C++ topics like memory management, and the Qt graphics library.

Zoom links can be found on the CCLE in the Discussion Links & Materials section
